meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Southern Gateway Park Naming
agenda_items.description: Authorize the naming of the Texas Capital Landing at Southern Gateway Park. Texas Capital Bank desires to make a $1 million contribution to Southern Gateway Public Green Foundation for a naming opportunity.

agenda_items.title: Southern Gateway Park Naming
agenda_items.description: Authorize the naming of the Methodist Health System Plaza at Southern Gateway Park. Methodist Health System desires to make a $1 million contribution to Southern Gateway Public Green Foundation for a naming opportunity.

agenda_items.title: Fair Park Naming
agenda_items.description: Authorize the naming of the McKesson Marget Grove at the Community Park at Fair Park. The McKesson Foundation desires to make a $2.5 million contribution for a naming opportunity.

agenda_items.title: Flag Pole Hill Park Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Anna Pollard, to serve alcohol at the White Rock North School Founders Day Picnic.

agenda_items.title: Service Price Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for preventative maintenance and repair services to concession kitchen equipment and appliances.

agenda_items.title: Officiating Service Price Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for Youth Sports Officiating Services for the Park and Recreation Department.

agenda_items.title: Kleberg Rylie Recreation Center
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Kleberg Rylie Recreation Center Gymnasium Renovation and Repairs Project.

agenda_items.title: Anita Na単ez Martinez Recreation Center
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Anita Na単ez Martinez Recreation Center Building Envelope Repairs.

financial_items.description: Contribution from Texas Capital Bank for naming opportunity at Southern Gateway Park.
